title: There may be a better way to reduce hospital readmission rates

title_detail.value: There may be a better way to reduce hospital readmission rates

summary: A recent study suggests that lay-health workers may be able to significantly reduce readmissions rates to hospitals for high risk patients following surgery.

summary_detail.value: A recent study suggests that lay-health workers may be able to significantly reduce readmissions rates to hospitals for high risk patients following surgery.
